data.comment: The match is underway at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
Cerezo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Cerezo in the half of Urawa.
Cerezo to take a throw-in in Urawa territory.
Goal kick for Urawa at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
In the minute 4, Free kick for Urawa in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Cerezo.
In the minute 9, In Osaka Cerezo attack through Tatsuhiro Sakamoto. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Urawa goal kick.
Kazuki Nagasawa of Urawa gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 11, Nobutsugu Murakami awards Cerezo a goal kick.
In Osaka, Leonardo of Urawa is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Urawa have been awarded a corner by Nobutsugu Murakami.
In the minute 16, Urawa's Ryosuke Yamanaka gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Cerezo defender.
Corner awarded to Urawa.
Nobutsugu Murakami awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 19, Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Cerezo in their own half.
Important block from the Urawa defence as Tatsuhiro Sakamoto fires in a strike for Cerezo.
Corner awarded to Urawa.
In the minute 22, Cerezo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Urawa in their own half.
Free kick Cerezo.
In the minute 28, Tatsuhiro Sakamoto (Cerezo) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In Osaka a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Urawa have a goal kick.
In the minute 30, Free kick for Cerezo in the half of Urawa.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Urawa in their own half.
Can Cerezo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Urawa's half?
In the minute 35, Cerezo's Yasuki Kimoto gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Osaka.
Cerezo needs to be cautious. Urawa have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 37, Nobutsugu Murakami signals a Cerezo throw-in in Urawa's half.
Cerezo have been awarded a corner by Nobutsugu Murakami.
Throw-in for Cerezo in the half of Urawa.
In the minute 43, Leonardo (Urawa) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Urawa have been awarded a corner by Nobutsugu Murakami.
Free kick for Cerezo in their own half.
In the minute 45, The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Osaka.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Cerezo are coming forward and Tatsuhiro Sakamoto gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 46, Goal kick for Urawa at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Cerezo.
The home team replace Yoichiro Kakitani with Hiroaki Okuno.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a throw-in for Cerezo, close to Urawa's area.
In the minute 48, Goal! Ken Tokura heads Cerezo into a 1-0 lead.
Great play from Tatsuhiro Sakamoto to set up the goal.
Cerezo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 51, Urawa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Osaka a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Cerezo's Eiichi Katayama has been booked in Osaka.
In the minute 51, Ryosuke Yamanaka for Urawa has been booked by Nobutsugu Murakami and receives a first yellow card.
Corner awarded to Cerezo.
Free kick for Urawa in their own half.
In the minute 54, Urawa have a dangerous throw-in.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Cerezo in their own half.
Urawa's Daiki Hashioka breaks free at Yanmar Stadium Nagai. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 57, Cerezo have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Cerezo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 61, Ball goes out of play for a Urawa goal kick.
Throw-in Cerezo.
Can Urawa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cerezo's half?
Cerezo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 62, The home team have replaced Ken Tokura with Koji Suzuki. This is the second substitution made today by Miguel Angel Lotina.
Throw-in for Urawa at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
Tsuyoshi Otsuki is making the team's first substitution at Yanmar Stadium Nagai with Yuki Muto replacing Shinzo Koroki.
In the minute 63, Urawa make their second substitution with Kenyu Sugimoto replacing Takahiro Sekine.
Nobutsugu Murakami awards Cerezo a goal kick.
In the minute 65, Leonardo for Urawa gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Cerezo goal kick.
Cerezo to take a throw-in in Urawa territory.
In the minute 66, Nobutsugu Murakami awards the away team a throw-in.
Urawa have been awarded a corner by Nobutsugu Murakami.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Cerezo in their own half.
In the minute 68, Throw-in for Urawa in their own half.
Ball safe as Cerezo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a Urawa throw-in in Cerezo's half.
In the minute 71, Nobutsugu Murakami signals a Urawa throw-in in Cerezo's half.
Free kick for Cerezo in their own half.
Urawa have a goal kick.
In the minute 72, Urawa are pushing forward but Kenyu Sugimoto's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Cerezo at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Cerezo in their own half.
In the minute 73, Koya Yuruki is replacing Kazuki Nagasawa for the away team.
Great finish from Thomas Deng to give Cerezo a 2-0 lead.
Throw-in Cerezo.
In the minute 76, Cerezo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Cerezo's Riku Matsuda misses with an attempt on goal.
Nobutsugu Murakami awards Urawa a goal kick.
In the minute 77, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in high up the field for Cerezo in Osaka.
Kenyu Sugimoto (Urawa) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 80, It's a goal kick for the home team in Osaka.
Takuya Aoki is on a sub for Ewerton for Urawa.
Urawa make their fifth substitution with Katsuya Iwatake replacing Daiki Hashioka.
In the minute 82, Urawa's Ryosuke Yamanaka misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Cerezo goal kick.
Yusuke Maruhashi is replacing Hiroshi Kiyotake for Cerezo at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
In the minute 83, Miguel Angel Lotina (Cerezo) is making a fourth substitution, with Jun Nishikawa replacing Yasuki Kimoto.
Miguel Angel Lotina (Cerezo) is making a fifth substitution, with Shota Fujio replacing Tatsuhiro Sakamoto.
Corner awarded to Urawa.
In the minute 87, Can Urawa capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Cerezo's half?
Can Urawa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cerezo's half?
Throw-in for Urawa at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
In the minute 89, Nobutsugu Murakami awards Cerezo a goal kick.
Throw-in Urawa.
Urawa are caught offside.
Nobutsugu Murakami will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Cerezo in the half of Urawa.
Urawa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Urawa to take a throw-in in Cerezo territory.
Nobutsugu Murakami awards the away team a throw-in.
Urawa have been awarded a corner by Nobutsugu Murakami.
Free kick Urawa.
It's 3-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
Goal! Cerezo extend their lead to 3-0 through Shota Fujio.
